replies.user_trip_directions_ask_directions: I would like to get directions
replies.trip_ask_travel_mode: Do you want to drive, walk, or use public transit?
replies.user_trip_directions_inform_mode_transit: I'd like to use public transit
replies.trip_ask_arrival_location: Where do you need to go?
replies.trip_ask_departure_time: When are you going to start your trip?
replies.db_inform_trip_directions_driving: [RESULT] APIName = trip_directions ; DetailedDrivingInstructions = [DIRECTIONS] ; DrivingInstructions = [DIRECTIONS] ; TravelMode = Driving ; TripLengthMinutes = [NUMBER] ; id = [NUMBER] ;
replies.db_inform_trip_directions_walking: [RESULT] APIName = trip_directions ; DetailedWalkingInstructions = [DIRECTIONS] ; WalkingInstructions = [DIRECTIONS] ; TravelMode = Walking ; TripLengthMinutes = [NUMBER] ; id = [NUMBER] ;
replies.db_inform_trip_directions_transit: [RESULT] APIName = trip_directions ; DetailedTransitInstructions = [DIRECTIONS] ; TransitInstructions = [DIRECTIONS] ; TravelMode = Transit; TripLengthMinutes = [NUMBER] ; id = [NUMBER] ;
replies.trip_inform_simple_step_ask_proceed: {simple_instruction:s} Can I proceed or do you require more detailed instructions?
replies.user_trip_directions_no_continue: No, can I get detailed instructions?
replies.trip_inform_last_step_and_done: {simple_instruction:s} Do you know how to reach your destination or would you require more detailed instructions?
replies.trip_instructions_done: There are no more directions - you have reached your destination.
replies.anything_else: Is there anything else that I can do for you?
replies.trip_inform_nothing_found: Unfortunately there are no routes that match your search. Would you like to change any of your criteria?
replies.out_of_scope: I am sorry, I don't quite understand what you mean. I am only able to help you with directions.
